column6: No longer with Magneto's Brotherhood, Wanda Maximoff is at a crossroads. Should she become a super hero like her friend Marvel Girl? Or will the Black Widow succeed in her goal of Scarlet Witch - Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D.!
column8: | artist:JULIA BACELLAR | penciller (cover):Roger Cruz | writer:Jeff Parker | letterer:Nate Piekos | colorist:Val Staples
